message.content:
cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.CL

The paper deals with the task of predicting the G-Score of video games based on multimodal information, specifically video and text. This involves techniques from multimedia (cs.MM) such as video analysis and natural language processing (NLP) (cs.CL), as well as machine learning (cs.LG) and information retrieval (IR) (cs.IR) for recommendation systems. Additionally, the paper mentions using computer vision (cs.CV) techniques for analyzing the video data.
